item.title: 据称电子艺界接近达成每股约 210 美元的收购交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，视频游戏制造商电子艺界公司（Electronic Arts Inc.【原文：Video game maker Electronic Arts Inc. is in advanced talks to go private at about $210 a share, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: DeepSeek 在下一代人工智能模型中首次采用 "稀疏关注 "方法
item.description: DeepSeek 周一更新了一个实验性人工智能模型，称这是向下一代人工智能迈出的一步。【原文：DeepSeek updated an experimental AI model Monday in what it called a step toward next-generation artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 印度航空从 StanChart 和印度银行融资 2.15 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度航空公司从印度银行和渣打银行筹集了约 2.15 亿美元用于再融资。【原文：Air India raised about $215 million from Bank of India and Standard Chartered Plc for refinancing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行计划两项与 45 亿欧元资产相关的特别储备金计划
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）正在就与约 45 亿欧元（53 亿美元）企业贷款和租赁合同相关的两项重大风险转移向投资者发出邀请。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is sounding out investors for two significant risk transfers tied to about €4.5 billion ($5.3 billion) of corporate loans and leasing contracts, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩洛哥债券在 S&P 获得令人垂涎的投资评级后上涨
item.description: 在 S&P 全球评级公司授予摩洛哥王国非洲唯一的欧洲债券发行人投资级评级后，摩洛哥的主权债券上涨，在 2030 年世界杯足球赛之前增强了其筹资能力。【原文：Morocco’s sovereign bonds rose after S&P Global Ratings awarded the kingdom the only investment-grade rating for a Eurobond issuer in Africa, boosting its fundraising power ahead of the 2030 soccer World Cup.】

item.title: 美联储沃勒称技术可提供更多支付选择
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）说，美国监管机构应该欢迎新技术为金融公司和消费者带来的好处，同时也要为促进安全设置防护栏。【原文：US regulators ought to welcome the ways new technologies could benefit financial firms as well as consumers, while imposing guardrails that promote safety, Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said.】

item.title: 美国黄金储备在创纪录上涨后价值达到 1 万亿美元
item.description: 美国财政部的黄金储备价值已超过 1 万亿美元，是政府资产负债表所列价值的 90 多倍。【原文：The US Treasury’s gold reserves have surpassed $1 trillion in value — more than 90 times what’s stated on the government’s balance sheet — as the precious metal breaks new all-time highs.】

item.title: 中国铜冶炼厂在过去的习惯和现在的痛苦中挣扎
item.description:
该行业必须削减产量，或联合起来改变命运。【原文：

The industry must cut output, or unite under one umbrella to change its fate.

】

item.title: 冰岛低成本航空公司 "Play "停运，导致乘客滞留
item.description: 冰岛低成本航空公司 Fly Play hf.因机票销售不佳和扭亏为盈计划失败，于周一停止运营，导致数千名乘客滞留，数百人失业。【原文：Icelandic low-cost carrier Fly Play hf. ceased operations Monday because of poor ticket sales and a failed turnaround plan, stranding thousands of passengers and putting hundreds of people out of work.】

item.title: PayPal 资本市场主管诺克斯离职，转投加密货币财政部
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc.’s head of capital markets, David Knox, was named chief financial officer at the digital-asset treasury company Hyperion DeFi Inc.】

item.title: 巴里克称首席执行官布里斯托离职，任命希尔为临时负责人
item.description: 在马克-布里斯托（Mark Bristow）离职近七年后，巴里克矿业公司任命马克-希尔（Mark Hill）为临时首席执行官。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. appointed Mark Hill as interim chief executive officer after Mark Bristow departed following almost seven years in the top job.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰和 xAI 的交易巩固了卡塔尔基金在美国 5000 亿美元的承诺
item.description: 市值 5,240 亿美元的卡塔尔投资局正在加大对美国的投资力度，高调承诺投资人工智能和数字基础设施，这凸显了多哈如何将其经济优先事项与中东地缘政治紧张局势分开。【原文：The $524 billion Qatar Investment Authority is stepping up its investments in the US with high-profile commitments to artificial intelligence and digital infrastructure, underscoring how Doha is keeping its economic priorities separate from geopolitical tensions in the Middle East.】

item.title: 美国收割条件有利，玉米接近一周低点
item.description: 玉米期货周一扩大跌幅，原因是美国中部的有利天气有助于农民加快收割，从而提高了世界最大谷物种植国的供应量。【原文：Corn futures extended losses on Monday as favorable weather in the central US helps farmers accelerate the harvest, boosting supplies available from the world’s largest grower of the grain.】

item.title: OpenAI 为更实用的个人人工智能带来希望
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，奥斯汀-卡尔（Austin Carr）将介绍 OpenAI 为 ChatGPT 用户提供个人每日简报和无所不知的助手所做的努力。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Austin Carr looks at OpenAI’s effort to offer ChatGPT users a personal daily briefing — and all-knowing assistant.】

item.title: 报告称，美国将迎来 3500 亿美元的核电热潮，为人工智能提供动力
item.description: 据彭博情报公司（Bloomberg Intelligence）称，电力需求的飙升将推动美国耗资 3500 亿美元的核电开支热潮，到 2050 年，反应堆的产量将增加 63%。【原文：Soaring demand for electricity will drive a $350 billion nuclear spending boom in the US, boosting output from reactors by 63% by 2050, according to Bloomberg Intelligence.】

item.title: 特朗普的 "减税墙 "与日俱增
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统似乎对关税有着贪得无厌的胃口。仅在上周，他就对品牌药品、厨柜和卡车征收了新的进口税。与此同时，他还下令对进口机器人和工业机械进行调查，而这似乎还将引发更多的调查。【原文：President Donald Trump has a seemingly insatiable appetite for tariffs. In the past week alone he has imposed new import taxes on branded medicines, kitchen cabinets and trucks. All while ordering up an investigation into imported robots and industrial machinery that seems likely to beget more.】

item.title: 低雇佣率 "的美国经济将数百万求职者拒之门外
item.description: 我是驻亚特兰大的美国经济记者迈克尔-萨索（Michael Sasso）。今天我们关注美国劳动力市场。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，可以在这里注册。【原文：I’m Michael Sasso, a US economy reporter in Atlanta. Today we’re looking at the US labor market. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: Peloton 将发布硬件和人工智能产品，开启扭亏为盈之路
item.description: Peloton Interactive 公司准备在三年内第二次东山再起，此前的努力没有达到预期，也没有进行任何面向消费者的重大升级。【原文：Peloton Interactive Inc. is preparing to kick off its second comeback attempt in three years, following a previous effort that fell short of expectations and lacked any major consumer-facing upgrades.】

item.title: 数百万工人被排除在 "低薪低火 "的美国就业市场之外
item.description:
"有时这会让人非常沮丧，因为你几乎开始贬低自己所做的其他一切，"一位申请了大约350个职位的求职者说。【原文：

‘Sometimes it can be very disheartening because you start to devalue almost everything else you’ve done,’ says a job hunter who has applied for about 350 positions.

】

item.title: 智利投资者转向公司债券寻求收益
item.description: 由于智利国库美元债券与美国同类债券的利差处于 2007 年以来的最低水平，固定收益投资者开始转向公司债券，试图抢夺一些溢价。【原文：As Chilean Treasury dollar bonds trade around their lowest spread to the US counterparts since 2007, fixed-income investors are turning to corporate bonds to try to snatch some premium.】

item.title: 道明的美国投资银行野心有可能将加拿大抛在后面
item.description: 今年 6 月，当数百名道明证券公司的董事总经理齐聚在俯瞰波士顿港的 Encore 酒店时，空气中弥漫着庆祝的气氛。不那么公开的是，也有抱怨声。【原文：As hundreds of TD Securities managing directors gathered at the Encore hotel overlooking Boston Harbor in June, there was a celebratory atmosphere in the air. Less publicly, there was grousing as well.】

item.title: 美国核电初创企业 Oklo 投资瑞典同行 Blykalla
item.description: 核电初创公司 Oklo Inc. 表示将共同领导瑞典反应堆制造商 Blykalla AB 的下一轮投资，两家公司同意在技术、供应链和监管方面开展合作。【原文：Nuclear power startup Oklo Inc. said it will co-lead the next investment round for Swedish reactor maker Blykalla AB as the two firms agreed to collaborate on technology, supply chains and regulation.】

item.title: Moelis 聘请前贝莱德创新主管推动私募基金发展
item.description: Moelis & Co.聘请贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Moelis & Co. hired BlackRock Inc.’s former innovation capital head to bolster its business of providing customized capital raising advice for private and public companies.】

item.title: 尼日利亚 Linetrale 公司在供应高峰来临前加强液化天然气贸易
item.description: 非洲能源公司 Linetrale LLC 加强了液化天然气贸易，而这一业务长期以来一直由几家老牌公司主导。【原文：African energy company Linetrale LLC stepped up trading in liquefied natural gas, a business long dominated by several established players.】

item.title: 阿波罗伊比利亚董事总经理将在七年后离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿波罗全球管理公司伊比利亚董事总经理巴勃罗-克雷斯波（Pablo Crespo）将在七年后离开这家投资公司。【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc.’s managing director for Iberia, Pablo Crespo, is leaving the investment firm after seven years, according to people familiar with the matter, who asked not to be named as the matter isn’t public.】

item.title: 华尔街在 "华丽 7 号 "之外寻找制胜的人工智能股票
item.description:
Broadcom、甲骨文和 Palantir 已在获奖者的神殿中赢得一席之地。【原文：

Broadcom, Oracle and Palantir have earned a place in the pantheon of winners.

】

item.title: 小米称新款 IPhone 在发布时超越前代机型
item.description: 小米公司（Xiaomi Corp. ）表示，该公司有信心其新款 iPhone 竞争对手的销量将超过其上一代机型，并称这款手机在上周六首次亮相后立即迎来了创纪录的需求。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. said it’s confident its new iPhone rival will exceed the sales of its previous model, saying the phone saw record demand immediately after its debut on Saturday.】

item.title: 中国与毛泽东时代的非洲铁路复兴签署 14 亿美元协议
item.description: 中国与赞比亚和坦桑尼亚签署协议，振兴连接非洲中部铜带和印度洋港口的铁路。【原文：China signed a deal with Zambia and Tanzania for the revitalization of a railway connecting the central African copperbelt with an Indian Ocean port.】

item.title: 中国涡轮机制造商聘请巴斯夫可再生能源公司首席执行官负责欧洲计划
item.description: 中国涡轮机制造商明阳智慧能源集团有限公司（Ming Yang Smart Energy Group Ltd.）聘请了德国化工巨头巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）的可再生能源部门主管担任新的欧洲首席执行官，希望在该地区的风能市场重新站稳脚跟。【原文：Chinese turbine maker Ming Yang Smart Energy Group Ltd. has hired German chemical giant BASF SE’s head of renewables as its new European chief executive, hoping to regain footing in the region’s wind market.】

item.title: 青少年死亡后，OpenAI 为 ChatGPT 推出家长控制功能
item.description: OpenAI 正在为 ChatGPT 推出家长控制功能。OpenAI 是在今年春天一名自杀身亡的青少年被指控依赖流行的聊天机器人作为指导后宣布这项功能的。【原文：OpenAI is launching parental controls for ChatGPT, which it announced following a lawsuit alleging a teenager who died by suicide this spring relied on the popular chatbot as a coach.】
